      • buildCollisionMap

        private void buildCollisionMap()
        Builds a 2 dimensional collision-map from the specified layer name for the current map.

      • isBlocked

        public static boolean isBlocked(int x,
                int y)
        Checks if the tile specified by the x and y coordinate is blocked on the current map.
        Parameters:
        x - tile coordinate
        y - tile coordinate
        Returns:
        True, if the tile specified by the coordinates is blocked or out of bounds

      • setBlocked

        public static void setBlocked(int x,
              int y,
              boolean value)
        Tries to set a value in the blocked array. If out of bounds nothing will be set.
        Parameters:
        x - tile coordinate
        y - tile coordinate
        value - to be set. true if tile should be blocked.

      • showGrid

        public void showGrid(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Draws a black Grid on the current map. The grid is only drawn for the part which is focused by the camera.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics

      • showBlocked

        public void showBlocked(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Displays the blocked array as rectangles. Green Color if true, else red. The grid is only drawn for the part which is focused by the camera.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics

      • createWater

        private boolean createWater()
                     throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        creates the Water Animations by reading from the map. Objects are from the type "water" stored within the "object layer".

        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        Parameters:
